page.title: 05A Typical School Day In Hoo.
page.content:
"I wake up on Friday mornings at 7am and get ready for school.I have to wear black trousers,a white shirt, a tie which is green,red and yellow and a black blazer.When I am ready I have my breakfast and I have puffed rice.Then I wash up my plate and clean my teeth.I leave at 8am.to walk to school.My first lesson is Music and RS.My second lesson is English and I like that.Then I have Physics and then Reading Tuition.I go home at 3.2Opm.and then do my homework until 9.oopm.I then watch the late night film on television and go to bed."
Written by a 14 year old pupil.
